## 2009-2010

```{r, echo=F, results='asis', message=FALSE}
library(exifr)
library(knitr)
files <- list.files("img/Magicbear")
files <- paste("img/Magicbear/",files, sep="")

dat <- read_exif(files)

for(i in 1:length(files)){
  cat("---")
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("#### ", dat[i,]$ObjectName)
  cat("\n")
  cat(dat[i,]$'Caption-Abstract', " | ",
      dat[i,]$Keywords)
  cat("\n\n")
  cat("![](",files[i],")", sep="")
  cat("\n\n")
}
```
